iCMS 2025 VIRTUAL CONFERENCE

The International Conference on Computing, Mathematics, and Statistics (iCMS) has been a prominent biennial event since 2013, uniting experts and researchers from around the world. The upcoming iCMS 2025, organized by the College of Computing, Informatics, and Mathematics at UiTM Kedah, Malaysia, will be the sixth edition of the conference. Under the theme “Accelerating Innovation: Navigating the Road to Research Excellence”, iCMS 2025 aims to explore cutting-edge developments in computing, mathematics, and statistics, providing a platform for practical solutions and interdisciplinary collaboration.

Previous iCMS conferences have consistently showcased high-quality research, with notable achievements in indexed journal publications and widely attended pre-conference workshops. Highlights include sessions by esteemed experts such as Prof. Dr. Matthias Templ and Prof. Dr. Yap Bee Wah, who shared insights on data visualization and predictive analytics. With iCMS 2025, participants can expect an enriching experience designed to inspire innovation and foster connections, contributing to the future of research and technology.
